item.title: Trump’s Russia deadline is set to expire, with tariffs at stake
item.description: Washington's deadline for Moscow to strike a ceasefire in Ukraine lapses on Friday, paving the way for potential White House tariffs on Russia's trade...

item.title: Judge orders temporary halt to construction at Florida's 'Alligator Alcatraz' detention center

item.title: See the full list of U.S. tariffs in place around the world
item.description: Tariffs on dozens of key U.S. trading partners came into effect Thursday.

item.title: Russia and UAE double down on trade, testing U.S. limits
item.description: Russian business in the UAE has ballooned since Moscow's invasion of Ukraine in 2022, as its citizens fled sanctions and mandatory conscription.
